summary: Comprehensive testing of ORBYA Iron Man HUD portfolio bug fixes. All 6 bug fixes verified working correctly: 1) Admin panel cursor is normal (auto), 2) Custom cursor hidden on iframes/videos, 3) Google Drive URL parsing works, 4) YouTube Shorts URL parsing works, 5) File uploads use /api/uploads/ path, 6) Admin panel has admin-page class for cursor override.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (200 OK)
Admin auth with password 'orbya2024' (200 OK)
Admin auth rejects wrong password (401)
File upload returns /api/uploads/ prefixed URL
Media list returns /api/uploads/ prefixed URLs
Uploaded files accessible via /api/uploads/{type}/{filename}
Projects endpoint returns data including YouTube Shorts URLs
Skills endpoint returns data
Contact form submission works
Contact messages retrieval works
Quote of the day endpoint works
Stats endpoint works
All quotes endpoint works
Config endpoint returns data without adminPassword
Admin panel login page renders correctly
Admin panel has 'admin-page' class after login
Admin panel cursor style is 'auto' (not custom cursor)
All 8 admin tabs render: Projects, Skills, Media, Stats, Quotes, Config, Colors, Messages
Custom cursor (ReticleCursor) NOT rendered on admin page
Custom cursor IS rendered on non-admin pages (home, work)
Work page loads with project cards and filter buttons
Video modal opens on project click
YouTube URL correctly parsed to embed format
YouTube Shorts URL correctly parsed to embed format (shorts/VIDEO_ID -> embed/VIDEO_ID)
Video modal close button works
Grid/Masonry view toggle works
Home page loads with HUD aesthetic elements
seed_data_creation: None - used existing project data with YouTube Shorts URLs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 6 bug fixes verified working. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_api.py with 15 passing tests. Key verified fixes: 1) CursorWrapper in App.js hides ReticleCursor on /admin route, 2) ReticleCursor.js checkIframeProximity() hides cursor over iframes, 3) VideoModal getEmbedUrl() handles YouTube Shorts (shorts/VIDEO_ID) and Google Drive URLs, 4) Backend /api/uploads/{type}/{filename} serves uploaded files, 5) Upload endpoint returns /api/uploads/ URLs, 6) index.css .admin-page class overrides cursor to auto.

bug_fixes_verified.admin_cursor_fix: VERIFIED - Admin page has 'admin-page' class, cursor style is 'auto', ReticleCursor component not rendered
bug_fixes_verified.iframe_cursor_hide: VERIFIED - checkIframeProximity() in ReticleCursor.js hides cursor over iframes/videos
bug_fixes_verified.file_upload_path: VERIFIED - Upload returns '/api/uploads/images/xxx.jpg', files accessible via GET /api/uploads/{type}/{filename}
bug_fixes_verified.admin_page_class: VERIFIED - Root div has className 'admin-page' for CSS cursor override
